Powers:
Ammo Whammy: (4 PP) RSelf Hex gun ammo has additional effects for 5 rd
Curse: (5 PP) RTouch Target suffers 1 level fatigue and additional level each sunset (Spirit neg)
Holy Symbol: (3 PP) RSelf Supernaturally evil creatures cannot attack self physically (Spirit neg (Raise Spirit-2)) for 5 rd (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Spirit-2)
Numb: (2 PP) RSelf Allies in 8" radius ignore 1 point of wound or fatigue penalties (Raise 2) for 5 rd
Sanctify: (10 PP) RTouch Supernaturally evil creatures in 15" sq suffer fatigue (Spirit neg (Raise Spirit-2)) until next sunset
Trinkets: (3 PP) R10" Creates 1 lb item for 5 rd (Raise 5 min) (+1 PP Creates a set of items; +2 PP Creates 2 lb item)
Wilderness Walk: (2 PP) RSelf Gives triple speed and untraceable in wilderness for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target)
